Script.string: The price of peace is always heavy.
When monstrosities appeared, bursting from the wounds of the Great Rift,
corruption and decay spread like plague, claiming thousands.
Some historians realized this could only be the work of the Archdevas,
power-hungry bloodmages from an ancient time.
Their black arts somehow pierced the storm barriers of their continent.
But they remained beyond our reach.
The alliances continued to squabble over petty noctenium.
Their feckless greed kept them blind to the true threat.
But keener minds called on shipmakers, to design new skycruisers to pierce the storm barrier;
Ready to pay the price, find the source,
